00033 GrPolygonNode::~GrPolygonNode()
00034 {
00035         unsigned int childCount = _children.GetElemCount();
00036         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < childCount; ++i )
00037         {
00038                 delete _children[ i ];
00039         }
00040         _children.Clear();
00041 }

00072 //----------------------------------------------------------
00073 bool
00074 GrPolygonNode::DeleteChildTree( const char* name, bool ignoreCase )
00075 {
00076         int ( *strxcmp )( const char* str1, const char* str2 );
00077         strxcmp = ignoreCase ? _stricmp : strcmp;
00078         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00079         {
00081                 if ( strxcmp( _children[ i ]->_name.c_str(), name ) == 0 )
00082                 {
00084                         delete _children[ i ];
00085                         RemoveChild( i );
00086 
00088                         return true;
00089                 }
00090                 else
00091                 {
00093                         if ( _children[ i ]->DeleteChildTree( name, ignoreCase ) )
00094                                 return true;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 
00099         return false;
00100 }

00102 //----------------------------------------------------------
00103 GrPolygonNode*
00104 GrPolygonNode::FindNode( const char* name, bool ignoreCase )
00105 {
00107         int ret = 0;
00108         if ( ignoreCase )
00109                 ret = _stricmp( _name.c_str(), name );
00110         else
00111                 ret = strcmp( _name.c_str(), name );
00112         if ( ret == 0 )
00113                 return this;
00114 
00116         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _children.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00117         {
00118                 GrPolygonNode* node = _children[ i ]->FindNode( name, ignoreCase );
00119                 if ( node )
00120                         return node;
00121         }
00122 
00124         return 0;
00125 }

00151 //----------------------------------------------------------
00152 void
00153 GrPolygonNode::BuildMeshList( UFastArray< URef< GrPolygonMesh > >& meshes )
00154 {
00156         const unsigned int meshCount = _meshes.GetElemCount();
00157         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00158         {
00160                 const unsigned int meshListCount = meshes.GetElemCount();
00161                 unsigned int j = 0;
00162                 for ( ; j < meshListCount; ++j )
00163                 {
00166                         if ( meshes[ j ] == _meshes[ i ] )
00167                                 break;
00168                 }
00169 
00171                 if ( j == meshListCount )
00172                 {
00173                         meshes.Push( _meshes[ i ] );
00174                 }
00175         }
00176 
00178         unsigned int childCount = _children.GetElemCount();
00179         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < childCount; ++i )
00180         {
00181                 _children[ i ]->BuildMeshList( meshes );
00182         }
00183 }

00185 //----------------------------------------------------------
00186 bool
00187 GrPolygonNode::Optimize( GrPolygonGroup& worldPolygons, const tstring& noOptimizePostfix )
00188 {
00189         if ( !CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) )
00190                 return false;
00191 
00193         bool retVal = true;
00194         unsigned int childCount = _children.GetElemCount();
00195         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < childCount; ++i )
00196         {
00197                 retVal = _children[ i ]->Optimize( worldPolygons, noOptimizePostfix ) && retVal;
00198         }
00199 
00201         MMat3x3 normalRot;
00202         bool valid = _world.GetRotate().InverseTransposed( normalRot );
00203         B_ASSERT( valid );
00204 
00206         unsigned int meshCount = _meshes.GetElemCount();
00207         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00208         {
00209                 worldPolygons.AddGroup( _meshes[ i ]->GetPolygons(), _world, normalRot );
00210         }
00211         _meshes.Clear();
00212 
00213         return retVal;
00214 }

00216 //----------------------------------------------------------
00217 void
00218 GrPolygonNode::Prune( const tstring& noOptimizePostfix )
00219 {
00220         if ( !CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) )
00221                 return;
00222 
00224         unsigned int i = 0;
00225         unsigned int childCount = _children.GetElemCount();
00226         for ( i = 0; i < childCount; ++i )
00227         {
00228                 if ( _children[ i ]->CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) )
00229                 {
00230                         _children[ i ]->PruneInternal( this, MMat4x4(), noOptimizePostfix );
00231                 }
00232         }
00233 
00235         i = 0;
00236         while ( i < _children.GetElemCount() )
00237         {
00238                 if ( _children[ i ]->CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) )
00239                 {
00240                         delete _children[ i ];
00241                         _children.Erase( i );
00242                         continue;
00243                 }
00244                 ++i;
00245         }
00246 }

00284 void
00285 GrPolygonNode::Update( const MMat4x4& parentWorld )
00286 {
00288         _world = parentWorld * _local;
00289 
00291         unsigned int childCount = _children.GetElemCount();
00292         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < childCount; ++i )
00293                 _children[ i ]->Update( _world );

00301 //----------------------------------------------------------
00302 void
00303 GrPolygonNode::PruneInternal( GrPolygonNode* root, const MMat4x4& transform, const tstring& noOptimizePostfix )
00304 {
00306         B_ASSERT( root );
00307         B_ASSERT( CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) );
00308 
00310         MMat4x4 curTransform = _local * transform;
00311 
00313         unsigned int i = 0;
00314         while ( i < _children.GetElemCount() )
00315         {
00316                 if ( !_children[ i ]->CanOptimize( noOptimizePostfix ) )
00317                 {
00318                         root->AddChild( _children[ i ] );
00319                         _children[ i ]->SetLocal( _children[ i ]->GetLocal() * curTransform );
00320                         _children.Erase( i );
00321                         continue;
00322                 }
00323 
00324                 _children[ i ]->PruneInternal( root, curTransform, noOptimizePostfix );
00325                 ++i;
00326         }
00327 }
00328 
00329 //----------------------------------------------------------
00330 bool
00331 GrPolygonNode::CanOptimize( const tstring& noOptimizePostfix )
00332 {
00334         if ( !_optimize )
00335                 return false;
00336 
00338         unsigned int meshCount = _meshes.GetElemCount();
00339         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshCount; ++i )
00340         {
00341                 if ( _meshes[ i ]->GetPolygons().IsSkinned() )
00342                         return false;
00343         }
00344 
00348         if ( noOptimizePostfix.length() == 0 )
00349                 return true;
00350 
00352         unsigned int postfixLen = ( unsigned int )noOptimizePostfix.length();
00353         unsigned int nameLen = ( unsigned int )_name.length();
00354         return ( nameLen < postfixLen || strcmp( _name.c_str() + ( nameLen - postfixLen ), noOptimizePostfix.c_str() ) != 0 );
00355 }
